item.title: Why Obtaining A Full-time Job Should Be Your Number One Priority
item.description: Committing towards a full-time job is one of the most fundamental things you can do in life to secure your future success. Not because of the money or the tireless hours spent making someone else rich. Those things are inconsequential to the true benefits of working full-time. Benefits which are incredibly difficult to replicate in other systems. Blah. Blah. Blah. Though perhaps you already know this. Perhaps you’ve already experienced first-hand the crushing resilience that full-time work forces upon you.
